SEARCH
Package org.red5.codec

Class AACAudio

java.lang.Object
org.red5.codec.AbstractAudio
org.red5.codec.AACAudio
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAudioStreamCodec
public class AACAudio extends AbstractAudio
Red5 audio codec for the AAC audio format. Stores the decoder configuration. Advanced Audio Coding The following AAC profiles, denoted by their object types, are supported 1 = main profile 2 = low complexity, a.k.a., LC 5 = high efficiency / scale band replication, a.k.a., HE / SBR
Author:
Paul Gregoire (mondain@gmail.com), Wittawas Nakkasem (vittee@hotmail.com), Vladimir Hmelyoff (vlhm@splitmedialabs.com)
